title: padhamalarE geyena
sahitya:
padamalarE gaiyena nambinEnayyaa - nin



anupallavi



sadamalavE nidamuRutuyar palavE - taraNiyul

tanajanagana menumoDum

uRavu kanavu nigarumenum ninaivoDu vanaja

(pada)



caraNam



tavamaRiyEn nyaan anubavamaRiyEn

vEdaantatattuvamaRiyEn

bhaktiyin ilakkaNamaRiyEn

mettakkai tavamuDaiyEn pEraaNavamuDaiyEn

aayinum ninnaadaravu tandaruLi

enRanukkaadaravu teerttaruLu moottiyenRun

(pada)
